org.ros.rosjava_geometry

Class FrameTransformTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.rosjava_geometry.FrameTransformTree

  • public class FrameTransformTree
extends java.lang.Object
    A tree of FrameTransforms.

    FrameTransformTree does not currently support time travel. Lookups always use the newest TransformStamped.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FrameTransformTree(NameResolver nameResolver)

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(geometry_msgs.TransformStamped transformStamped)
        Updates the tree with the provided TransformStamped message.

        Note that the tree is updated lazily. Modifications to the provided TransformStamped message may cause unpredictable results.

        Parameters:
        transformStamped - the TransformStamped message to update with

      • lookUp

        public FrameTransform lookUp(GraphName source)
        Returns the most recent FrameTransform for target source.
        Parameters:
        source - the frame to look up
        Returns:
        the most recent FrameTransform for source or null if no transform for source is available

      • get

        public FrameTransform get(java.lang.String source)
        See Also:
        lookUp(GraphName)

      • lookUp

        public FrameTransform lookUp(GraphName source,
                    Time time)
        Returns the FrameTransform for source closest to time.
        Parameters:
        source - the frame to look up
        time - the transform for frame closest to this Time will be returned
        Returns:
        the most recent FrameTransform for source or null if no transform for source is available

      • get

        public FrameTransform get(java.lang.String source,
                 Time time)
        See Also:
        lookUp(GraphName, Time)

      • transform

        public FrameTransform transform(GraphName source,
                       GraphName target)
        Returns:
        the FrameTransform from source the frame to the target frame, or null if no FrameTransform could be found
